parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Creates a link to the section of diary given by subject. Record is selected based on given object, diary record or task.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''createDiaryLink''' [subject, record, text]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> subject: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> record: [[Object]], [[Task]] or [[Diary Record]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[String]] - empty string <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>""</value></part></template> or string in <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value><tt>[[format]] ["<log subject<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>""%1"" record<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>""%2"">%3</log>", subject, processedRecordId, text]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_link <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[createDiarySubject]] ["Group", [[player]], "Player"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>diaryRec1 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 1", "We can't refer to next record (("]];
diaryRec2 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 2", "Go to " + ([[createDiaryLink]] ["Diary", diaryRec1, "record 1"])]]; 
diaryRec3 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 3", "Go to " + ([[createDiaryLink]] ["Diary", diaryRec2, "record 2"])]];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>funcProcessDiaryLink = {
    [[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryLink]] ["diary", _this, ""];
};
diaryRec1 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 1", 
    "In this example, we can go to any next record: go to <execute expression='diaryRec2 call funcProcessDiaryLink'>Record 2</execute>"
]];
diaryRec2 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 2", 
    "Go to <execute expression='diaryRec3 call funcProcessDiaryLink'>Record 3</execute>"
]];
diaryRec3 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 3", 
    "Go to <execute expression='diaryRec1 call funcProcessDiaryLink'>Record 1</execute>"
]];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryRecord]] [[createDiarySubject]] [[diarySubjectExists]] [[setDiaryRecordText]]
</value></part></template></root>
